span.span: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是不可變，而且在建立之後無法變更。A object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created. 為了安全性，可以是內部組件相關聯。For security, a can be associated with parts within a . A包含 X.509 憑證，其提供兩個功能：A incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - 識別並驗證組件的建立者。Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part. - 驗證組件未遭修改。Validates that the part has not been modified. 數位簽章不會阻止組件被修改，但如果組件以任何方式變更，就會失敗，簽章驗證檢查。The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way. 應用程式可以做出一些適當的動作 — 例如，它可以防止開啟組件或組件已經過修改，而且並不安全，它可以通知使用者。The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure. 如需封裝數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章[Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
